summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 MERCEDES-BENZ GLC300. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V114000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM, ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING). THE MANUFACTURER WAS UNABLE TO PROVIDE A SPECIFIC TIME FRAME FOR THE PARTS TO ARRIVE FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. UPDATED 08/23/17*LJ    *CN
